entry.title: About the wg-silent-payments category
entry.summary:
The discussions within the category focus on supporting BIP352 wallets, which encompass a broad array of topics such as protocol updates and implementation specifics. This includes a deep dive into descriptors, PSBTs (Partially Signed Bitcoin Transactions), hardware wallet devices (HWW), and protocols suitable for light clients. The conversation extends to cover various implementation techniques and potential optimizations that could be applied to enhance the functionality or efficiency of these systems.
It's important to note that this forum is dedicated exclusively to technical discussions surrounding the support and implementation of BIP352. It is not a platform for debating the value or comparing BIP352 against other protocols. Any conversations aimed at questioning the merits of BIP352, or suggestions for modifications to the BIP, are directed to take place on the bitcoin dev mailing list, ensuring that discussions here remain focused and relevant to the subject matter at hand. This structure helps maintain a concentrated dialogue on the technical aspects, promoting a more productive exchange of ideas and solutions within the community.
